components/worker/booking-status-badge.t.architecture: Functional component with styled variants using CVA
key_features: Responsive styling with dark mode support

patterns_discovered: Consistent use of CVA (class-variance-authority) for component styling
Type-safe status variants with proper TypeScript types
Dark mode support baked into component design
Accessibility-first approach with focus states and semantic HTML
Structured component architecture with proper prop interfaces
Separation of concerns: styling logic separated from presentation logic

approach_outcome.approach: Implemented clean, reusable UI component with TypeScript safety and modern styling patterns
approach_outcome.efficiency: High - Single file creation with comprehensive implementation
approach_outcome.maintainability: High - Clear structure and type definitions

recommendations: Continue using this CVA pattern for other status display components
Consider adding accessibility ARIA attributes for screen readers
Potential to extend with additional features like tooltips or icons
Good candidate for integration with booking dashboard components
Consider implementing unit tests for the component
